main.name: Tingyu Jiang
main.bio: Innovative optimized solution seeker with solid full stack end-to-end development experience in e-commerce solutions using .NET and Angular. Led a decade-long solution upgrade. Proactively initiated and organized a study group, demonstrating leadership and collaborative skills. Proficient in exceptional cross-platform and cross-team communication. Ambitious, adventurous, and independent, yet dedicated to teamwork. Passionate about software engineering, I thrive on pushing boundaries and pursuing my dreams outside the comfort zone.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: C#, ASP.net, MVC, EF Core, MSSQL, Angular, Vue, JavaScript/HTML/CSS, Git, RESTful API, Docker, NUnit, MongoDB, Java, PostgreSQL, C, Python

education.degree: Microsoft C# Full Stack Engineering Bootcamp

work.title: Software System Engineer
work.description1: - Developed and maintained 2 front-end solutions(Vue, Nuxt) with integration to back-end APIs, ensuring cross-platform consistency across web, Android, and iOS.
work.description2: - Managed and implemented eKYC module maintenance and integration.
work.description3: - Developed a full-stack project (Java17, Spring MVC, Thymeleaf, PostgresSQL, Gradle), and JavaScript modules.

work.title: Backend Engineer
work.description1: - Led the upgrade of a multi-project .NET backend solution (600+ APIs) from .NET Framework 4.6 to .NET 7, overseeing seamless integration testing for a flawless transition using Postman.
work.description2: - Maintained and implemented new features in two ESH SaaS solution modules (.NET 6, Dapper, CQRS).
work.description3: - Practiced Agile development for efficient project management (Azure DevOps).

projects.title: Todo List
projects.category: A side project I made to learn NUnit & MongoDB

testimonials.text: We're lucky to have her. She's smart and outstanding. Also good at communicating, a great team-player and fun to work with!

Tingyu is a brilliant, self-motivated developer. Not only able to solve problems independently with a clear mind but also has good communication skills and a can-do attitude. She may not have much job experience but I am confident that she will meet and exceed your expectations.
